data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I'm not sure of the name. I have a bunch of tools for digital
    libraries which are being named Library::Catalog, Library::Simple.
    These namespaces are not registered, and I want to define a correct
    name for these modules, so they appear on the CPAN tree.

    At the moment, one of related modules (Biblio::Thesaurus) is
    already a registered namespaces.

    I'm accepting Ideas! Thanks

    PS: When possible, reply to my email, too (ambs@cpan.org). Thanks
